arabicText: وَقَالَ لِفِتْيَـٰنِهِ ٱجْعَلُوا۟ بِضَـٰعَتَهُمْ فِى رِحَالِهِمْ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَعْرِفُونَهَآ إِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمْ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
englishTranslationText:
He	said	to	his	slaves,	“Place	their	means	back	into	their	sacks,	perhaps	they	may	recognise	it	when	
they	return	to	their	homes,	perhaps	they	may	come	again.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Yūsuf ne	apne	ghulāmoñ	se	kahā	in	ki	pooñji	in	ki	khurjiyoñ	(	Thailo)	meiñ	rakh	do	shāyad	woh	
ise	pahchāneñ	jab	apne	ghar	ki	țaraf		laut	kar	jāyeñ	shāyad	woh	wāpas	āayeñ

arabicText: فَلَمَّا رَجَعُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰٓ أَبِيهِمْ قَالُوا۟ يَـٰٓأَبَانَا مُنِعَ مِنَّا ٱلْكَيْلُ فَأَرْسِلْ مَعَنَآ أَخَانَا نَكْتَلْ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَـٰفِظُونَ
englishTranslationText:
So	when	they	returned	to	their	father,	they	said,	“O	our	father!	The	provisions	have	been	denied	
to	us,	therefore	send	our	brother	with	us	so	that	we	may	bring	the	provisions,	and	we	will	surely	
protect	him.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	jab	woh	apne	bāp	ki	țaraf		laut	kar	gaye	bole	aey	hamāre	bāp!	Ham	se	ghalla	rok	diyā	gayā	hai	to	
hamāre	bhāi	ko	hamāre	sāth	bhej	dijiye	ke	ghalla	lāyeñ	aur	ham	zaroor	is	ki	hifāzat	kareñ	ge.

arabicText: قَالَ هَلْ ءَامَنُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ إِلَّا كَمَآ أَمِنتُكُمْ عَلَىٰٓ أَخِيهِ مِن قَبْلُ ۖ فَٱللَّهُ خَيْرٌ حَـٰفِظًۭا ۖ وَهُوَ أَرْحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
He	 said,	 “Shall	 I	 trust	 you	 regarding	 him	
the	 same	 way	 I	 had	 trusted	 you	 earlier	
regarding	 his	 brother?	 Therefore	Allah is	
the	Best	Protector;	and	He	is	More	Merciful	
than	all	those	who	show	mercy.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kahā	kyā	is	ke	bāre	meiñ	tum	par	waisā	hi	
e’etibār	kar	looñ	jaisā	pahle	is	ke	bhāi	ke	
bāre	meiñ	kiyā	 thā	 to	Allāh	sab	se	behtar	
nigehban	aur	woh	har	meherbān		se	badh	
kar	meherbān
